alert.note: Alert for Florence (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 10:09AM CDT until May 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near McAllister affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near Florence affecting Dickinson, Florence and Iron Counties. For the Menominee River...including Florence, McAllister...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Menominee River near Florence. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Floodwaters reach a few homes and cottages along Runbers Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Sunday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
